definitions.definition: One that looks or is actively looking; a watcher ; an observer .
One having a specific look or appearance .
Someone or something who is remarkably good-looking .
examples: Wow, your new man is much more of a looker than your last one!

definitions.definition: A person who pretends to be interested in purchasing something but has no intention of doing so.

main_definition: ( literally ) One that looks or is actively looking; a watcher ; an observer .
secondary_definitions: One having a specific look or appearance .
( slang ) Someone or something who is remarkably good-looking .
A person who pretends to be interested in purchasing something but has no intention of doing so.
